dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle disagreements or conflicts?

options.description: Your FarTwin will fiercely assert their position and engage in heated debates.
Your FarTwin will actively listen to opposing views, seeking common ground and compromise.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How willing is your FarTwin to take calculated risks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will eagerly pursue high-stakes opportunities, weighing potential rewards against uncertainty.
Your FarTwin will cautiously approach new challenges, prioritizing stability and security over growth.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin express themselves creatively?

options.description: Your FarTwin will channel their creativity into artistic pursuits, such as music, writing, or visual art.
Your FarTwin will approach creative endeavors through analytical lenses, focusing on precision and technical skill.

dimensions.label: Data Analysis Style
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin handle data-driven insights?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rapidly grasp key trends and patterns, trusting their instincts to guide decision-making.
Your FarTwin will meticulously analyze data, methodically identifying insights through rigorous testing and validation.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin approach new knowledge or skills?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through hands-on experiences, applying theory to practical situations.
Your FarTwin will prefer a more abstract approach, focusing on theoretical foundations before applying knowledge.

dimensions.label: Social Circle
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin tend to gather and interact with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will naturally gravitate towards large social gatherings, feeling energized by diverse conversations.
Your FarTwin will prefer smaller, more personal connections, cultivating deep relationships with a select few.

dimensions.label: Professional Drive
dimensions.description: How driven is your FarTwin in their professional pursuits?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be relentlessly driven to succeed, setting high standards and pushing through obstacles.
Your FarTwin will maintain a steady pace, consistently delivering quality work while avoiding unnecessary risks or stress.
